one_reviews_text: it might be buggy but is is free
ep1 is so laggy don't buy
I loved it right when i started playing.... This makes me feel like im in an anime.... yes whatever call me a weeb if you want. I enjoy the idea of having abilities !

Ok, I have to change my review of this demo.
While the demo is prety good and works flawlessly the game itself isn't.
Ep.1 is bugged and broken, almost unplayable. Don't buy it.

It’s a puzzle and just drops you in with little direction. This is part of its charm. The graphics and atmosphere are amazing. I am planning on purchasing all episodes this is incredible with room scale! My jaw dropped with this.
Very short demo but cool gameplay. Would definitely wait for these devs to put the two games on sale before purchasing.
Ok. The first time I loaded the game, it sat there for maybe 10 minutes before it opened but now it opens just fine. The actually game, well, I wouldn't pay $30 for it but this demo is awesome!
Refuses to load. I had this on Steam, and it worked just fine. I try downloading it on Oculus, and it acts like it doesn't want to open. Get the Steam version of this if it's not working on here.

For those saying it needs more hand holding, I'm an idiot and made it through the demo so there. 
I was entertained by the demo and just loved the 'pass the stone though the obstacles' door/chest keys. I have never done anything like that in VR and it was way cool.

It's not bad for being free.  Really shows off how nice the graphics are in the actual game.  Has some puzzles and backstory to the main game I suppose.  I managed to open 2 of the 3 doors.  I have no idea how to open the 3rd door.  Maybe I missed something.  You have to put balls in the right place.  I didn't see where to put the extra balls I had.  But there's nothing here to make me want to push forward.
Very well polished game demo. The movement is a bit hard to pin down as it doesn't reorient you on jump, but it's still good. Very fun, worth your time.
the actual game might be good, but this "demo" is terrible. no idea what i'm suppose to do. the minimal tutorial doesn't help. spent the entire time confused until i had enough and quit.
the game doesnt even start for me every time i atempt to play it the game just becomes unresponsive

its a great demo 
 close the curtans everybody i said oh no

well the haters gona hate or what???

review_title: Emberstone a lot of game for free
one_reviews_text: Hard to enjoy all of the game, needs more help or hints to get to everything. Could very easily be 5stars.
